rdf:Description.dc:title: Environment views 1981
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environment.
Alberta. Alberta Environmental Protection.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Issue for April/May 1981 called v. 3, no. 7 but constitutes v. 4, no. 1.
Issues for spring 1986 and June 1986 both called v. 8 no. 6 but constitute v. 9, nos. 1 and 2.
Issue for June 1990 called v. 12 no. 5 but constitutes v. 13 no. 1.
Merged with: Environment network news, to form: Environment views/Environment network news.
Environment views/Environment network news became: Encompass (Drayton Valley, Alta.)
UA BARD copy in the Bryan-Gruhn collection.
27:GOV DOC CA2 AL EO E55a v.1:no.2- v.4 1978-1981
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Environmental protection
